paragraphs: I am a certified financial advisor with 10 years of experience in the banking sector, having worked at renowned institutions such as UBS, Banco Santander, and currently BNP Paribas. My expertise spans various areas, including wealth management, asset custody, financial control and reporting.

I have also participated in RPA and Alteryx projects, enhancing my ability to leverage technology for data analysis and process optimization. I am trilingual in English, French, and Spanish, allowing me to communicate effectively with a diverse clientele and collaborate in multicultural settings.
Committed to excellence, I am always seeking opportunities to improve processes and add value.
name: Deborah Mart√≠n Redondo
